review: It works fine,  i just thought it was a streaming stick from phone to tv. It would be nice if it did that also.
author: Rhonda Gross

review: Totally love it, it was so easy 2 install and it just took me like 10 min between the plug-in of the stick, turn on and watch the introduction video, and I was ready 2 watch my favorites tv shows and find some movies from Netflix and other app ...
author: Patricia

review: I bought this for a gift, so I can't comment on specifics. Was told it was easy to set up and simple to use. Tons of movies and content if you are a Prime member. Has worked perfectly so far!
author: D.M. "online shopper"

review: Just what I was looking for thank you
author: Dennis Howard

review: I love it so much thank you very much
author: jan henry

review: I haven't had much time to play with it but so far I love it.  The picture seems better than when I would stream from my PC.  Watching movies it is fast and clear.  If you don't have a smart TV this is the next best thing.Setup took me about a minute, couldn't be easier
author: Larry

review: If you like movies and remember old ones that you want to see get this ASAP!  For a long time I had remembered seeing "Paper Moon" starring Ryon O'Neil and his daughter Tatum, but could never find it to watch.  That changed when I bought the "Firestick."  Now I have access to almost any movie I want to see again. Easy to install and operate - Get it!
author: EDMOND P. LULL "Edmond P. Lull"
